Description: Fragment of sub-round handle from neck join to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine orange-brown. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Kastor. Agora SS2677 is from the same die, as is Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0370.17.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (352)
